definition: to correct student papers/to grade exam papers
to ascertain/to act on/to criticize/to pass on/classifier for batches, lots, military flights/tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)
scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll

sentences.english: In Foreign Languages Department, a checking machine is used to correct the students' test papers.
sentences.chinese: 外语教研部用阅卷机给学生批卷。

definition: to mark (homework, exam scripts etc)/to correct and criticize (an article)/to check/to correct/a correction (to a piece of writing)
to draw up the theme (for discussion)
an examiner/an official conducting an exam
to give a detailed exposition/to state in detail
exam candidate/student whose name has been put forward for an exam
